entry.title: HackTheBox - BOX NAME HERE
entry.summary: Everything below is just random stuff for the sake of example. Information Gathering Nmap We begin our reconnaissance by running an Nmap scan checking default scripts and testing for vulnerabilities. x@wartop:~$ nmap -sVC 192.168.100.6 Starting Nmap 7.01 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2019-08-11 08:57 PDT Nmap scan report for 192.168.100.6 (192.168.100.1) Host is up (0.022s latency). Not shown: 99...
